targets.queryText:
select username as Owner, workload AS Workload, 
transactions AS "Transactions",
run_time AS "Running Time",
throughput as "TransPerSec",
cycles_per_second AS "CyclesPerSec",
instructions_per_second AS "InstsPerSec",
CPI AS "CPI", cycles_per_requests AS "CyclesPerReq",
cpu_frequency_mhz AS "CPU Freq(MHz)",
path_length AS "Path Length", platform AS Platform, hw_info AS "HW Config", 
sw_info AS "SW Config", used_threads AS "Logical Cores",
record AS "Record",
comment AS "Comment" from "$Table";
targets.rawQueryText:
select username as Owner, workload AS Workload, 
transactions AS "Transactions",
run_time AS "Running Time",
throughput as "TransPerSec",
cycles_per_second AS "CyclesPerSec",
instructions_per_second AS "InstsPerSec",
CPI AS "CPI", cycles_per_requests AS "CyclesPerReq",
cpu_frequency_mhz AS "CPU Freq(MHz)",
path_length AS "Path Length", platform AS Platform, hw_info AS "HW Config", 
sw_info AS "SW Config", used_threads AS "Logical Cores",
record AS "Record",
comment AS "Comment" from "$Table";

targets.queryText:
SELECT transactions AS "Throught", 
throughput AS "TransPerSec", 
cycles_per_second AS "CyclesPerSec",
instructions_per_second AS "InstsPerSec",
cpu_frequency_mhz AS "CPU Freq(MHz)",
CPI AS "CPI", cycles_per_requests AS "CyclesPerReq", path_length AS "Path Length", 
hw_info AS "HW Config", 
sw_info AS "SW Config", 
used_threads AS "Logical Cores" from "$Table" WHERE Record = "$Record";
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT transactions AS "Throught", 
throughput AS "TransPerSec", 
cycles_per_second AS "CyclesPerSec",
instructions_per_second AS "InstsPerSec",
cpu_frequency_mhz AS "CPU Freq(MHz)",
CPI AS "CPI", cycles_per_requests AS "CyclesPerReq", path_length AS "Path Length", 
hw_info AS "HW Config", 
sw_info AS "SW Config", 
used_threads AS "Logical Cores" from "$Table" WHERE Record = "$Record";

targets.queryText: SELECT cpu_usr AS "usr%" FROM $Table WHERE Record = "$Record";
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT cpu_usr AS "usr%" FROM $Table WHERE Record = "$Record";

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT cpu_nice AS "nice%" FROM $Table WHERE Record = "$Record";

targets.queryText: SELECT cpu_idle AS "idle%" FROM $Table WHERE Record = "$Record";

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT kbcommit AS "memcommit" FROM $Table WHERE Record = "$Record";

targets.queryText:
SELECT kbavail AS "memavail",
percent_commit AS "memcommit%",
percent_memused AS "memused%",
kbactive AS "memactive",
kbinact AS "meminact",
kbdirty AS "memdirty",
kbanonpg AS "memanonpg",
kbkstack AS "memkstack",
kbpgtbl AS "mempgtbl",
kbvmused AS "memvmused",
kbcommit AS "memcommit" FROM "$Table" 
WHERE Record = "$Record";
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT kbavail AS "memavail",
percent_commit AS "memcommit%",
percent_memused AS "memused%",
kbactive AS "memactive",
kbinact AS "meminact",
kbdirty AS "memdirty",
kbanonpg AS "memanonpg",
kbkstack AS "memkstack",
kbpgtbl AS "mempgtbl",
kbvmused AS "memvmused",
kbcommit AS "memcommit" FROM "$Table" 
WHERE Record = "$Record";

targets.queryText:
SELECT dev AS "Dev",
tps AS "Trans/s",
disk_await AS "Disk Await",
percent_disk_util AS "Disk Util%",
rkB_s AS "ReadkB/s",
wkB_s AS "WritekB/s",
dkB_s AS "DiskkB/s",
areq_sz AS "Request Size/REQ",
aqu_sz AS "Queue Size/Q"
FROM "$Table" WHERE Record = "$Record";
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT dev AS "Dev",
tps AS "Trans/s",
disk_await AS "Disk Await",
percent_disk_util AS "Disk Util%",
rkB_s AS "ReadkB/s",
wkB_s AS "WritekB/s",
dkB_s AS "DiskkB/s",
areq_sz AS "Request Size/REQ",
aqu_sz AS "Queue Size/Q"
FROM "$Table" WHERE Record = "$Record";

options.content:
<!-- HTML -->
<!-- <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/firacode@6.2.0/distr/fira_code.css"> -->
<style type="text/css">
  /* CSS */
  /*
  @import url(https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/firacode@6.2.0/distr/fira_code.css);
  body { font-family: 'Fira Code', monospace; font-size: 1em; }

  @supports (font-variation-settings: normal) {
    body { font-family: 'Fira Code VF', monospace; font-size: 1em; }
  }
  */
  body {
    font-family: Consolas, Monaco, 'Courier New', monospace;
  }
</style>

Turn on this to make the dashboard's fonts monospace

list.definition: SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = "table"
list.name: Table
list.query: SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = "table"

list.definition: SELECT "'" || workload || '-' || username || '-' || platform || '-' || upload_time || "'" FROM $Table WHERE Record = "${Record}";
list.name: Info
list.query: SELECT "'" || workload || '-' || username || '-' || platform || '-' || upload_time || "'" FROM $Table WHERE Record = "${Record}";
